snippet.title: Goblin Camp - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Goblin Camp is a fantasy city-building game inspired by Finnish mythology. Deep simulation mechanics capture the unique challenges of surviving the harsh winters and carving a thriving settlement out of the northern forest. Lead your goblins to greatness!

Wishlist now on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2431980/Goblin_Camp/

Goblin Camp is a game by Korppi Games, a three-person games company in southern Finland.
Music by video game composer Henri Sorvali (Moonsorrow, Finntroll).

Follow us on Mastodon: https://mastodon.gamedev.place/@korppi
Join our Discord server: https://discord.gg/RdTz3zUdJJ
